name: MEComposeSessionError.Code
desc: Errors that indicate invalid compose session states.

items.name: case invalidBody
items.desc: An error code that indicates the message’s body is invalid.

items.name: case invalidHeaders
items.desc: An error code that indicates one or more of the message’s headers are invalid.

items.name: case invalidRecipients
items.desc: An error code that indicates one or more of the message’s recipients are invalid.
